english.segment1: I put on my stinking coat again. But that so much rain would come from inside. I didn't understand. I could always protect me. But I couldn't protect me from this. That all of this was just a death kiss
english.segment2: Just one silent word and I'm whole again. You said it
english.segment3: Look at me now. I'm hardly moving. It's only you and me now. It's only you. I scream but the walls suck my air
english.segment4: I look at my arms resting on her back. They can't be mine they look more dead then alive. I hate that I own the ability to not get back on track. I wet her hair and they still look more dead then alive
english.segment5: To be allowed to break into a thousand pieces. In her arms and in your hand. Can't even form my lips to say Jesus. But I thank you for knowing where I'm supposed to land
english.segment6: People say I should eat more, boy they should see me now. I'm almost vanishing, skin so thin I can see right through. Makes you more visible inside me, you rise as I bow. Fight for every breath and breathe only you
